text: aur yaad karo jab ibaraaheem ne kaha, "ai mere rab! mujhe dikha de, too murdon ko kaise jeevit karega?" kaha," kya tujhe vishvaas nahin?" usane kaha,"kyon nahin, kintu nivedan isalie hai ki mera dil santusht ho jae." kaha, "achchha, to chaar pakshee le, phir unhen apane saath bhalee-bhaanti hila-mila se, phir unamen se pratyek ko ek-ek parvat par rakh de, phir unako pukaar, ve tere paas lapakakar aaenge. aur jaan le ki allaah atyant prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai.
